mapper.select: SELECT i.investCode, i.investFdCode, i.investId, i.purchaseShares, i.investTime, i.payCheck , i.purchaseShares * f.issuePrice ia, f.fdTitle, f.issuePrice, c.comName , dp.divPayCode, dp.divPayFdTitle, dp.divPayAmount, dp.divPayDate, dp.divPayissuePrice, dp.divPayPurchaseShares , dp.divPayNoShares, dp.divPayMinInterestRate, dp.divPayDividendRate, dp.divPayTotalMargin , (dp.divPayAmount/(i.purchaseShares * f.issuePrice))*100 roe FROM investment i LEFT JOIN dividendpay dp ON i.investCode=dp.divPayInvestCode LEFT JOIN funding f ON i.investFdCode=f.fdCode LEFT JOIN company c ON f.fdComCode=c.comCode ORDER BY investTime ASC

SELECT f.fdCode, f.fdComCode, f.fdTitle, c.comName, ms.milestoneCode, ms.milestoneStep, ms.milestoneName, ms.milestoneSummary , ms.pm, wp.wbsPlanCode, wp.wbsPlanChange, wp.wbsPlanName, wp.wbsPlanStartDate, wp.wbsPlanDuration , wp.wbsPlanWriteDate, wp.wbsPlanManager, wp.wbsMargin, wa.wbsActualCode, wa.wbsActualName, wa.wbsActualStartDate , wa.wbsActualEndDate, wa.wbsActualDuration, wa.wbsActualStatus, wa.wbsActualProgress, wa.wbsActualWriteDate , wa.wbsActualApprovalDate, wa.wbsActualWriteManager, wa.wbsActualApprovalManager, wdm.wdmgCode, wdm.wdmgMargin , wdm.wdmgDate, wpm.wpmgCode, wpm.wpmgMargin FROM funding f LEFT JOIN company c ON f.fdComCode=c.comCode LEFT JOIN milestone ms ON f.fdCode=ms.msFdCode LEFT JOIN wbsplan wp ON ms.milestoneCode=wp.wbsPlanMsCode LEFT JOIN wbsactual wa ON ms.milestoneCode=wa.wbsActualMsCode LEFT JOIN wbsdailymargin wdm ON ms.milestoneCode=wdm.wdmgMsCode LEFT JOIN wbsplanmargin wpm ON ms.milestoneCode=wpm.wpmgMsCode ORDER BY c.comName ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fundingauth (authFdCode, authReceiver, authGiver, fdAuthLevelCode) VALUES (#{authFdCode}, #{authReceiver}, #{authGiver}, #{fdAuthLevelCode})
mapper.select: SELECT f.fdCode, f.fdTitle, f.fdPublisher, f.fdApprovalId, f.adminApproval, f.fdType, c.comName, c.comCode FROM funding f INNER JOIN company c ON f.fdComCode=c.comCode WHERE fdComCode = ANY (SELECT e.emComCode FROM user u INNER JOIN employee e ON u.userId = e.emUserId WHERE u.userId = #{userId}) ORDER BY comName
SELECT authLevelCode, authLevelName FROM fundingauthlevel

SELECT f.fdCode, f.fdTitle, f.openDate, f.closeDate, f.minInterestRate, f.fdType, f.fdStatus, f.projectStartDate, f.projectEndDate, f.fdPublisher, f.adminApproval, f.fdApprovalDate, f.fdApprovalId, f.fdDate, c.comName FROM funding f INNER JOIN company c ON f.fdComCode = c.comCode ORDER BY f.fdDate asc

SELECT fa.authCode, fa.authFdCode, fa.authReceiver, fa.authGiver, fa.fdAuthLevelCode, f.fdComCode, f.fdTitle, f.fdStatus, fl.authLevelName, c.comName FROM fundingauth fa INNER JOIN funding f ON fa.authFdCode = f.fdCode INNER JOIN company c ON f.fdComCode = c.comCode INNER JOIN fundingauthlevel fl ON fa.fdAuthLevelCode = fl.authLevelCode WHERE fa.authGiver=#{giverUserId} ORDER BY c.comName asc

SELECT fa.authCode, fa.authFdCode, fa.authReceiver, fa.authGiver, fa.fdAuthLevelCode, f.fdComCode, f.fdTitle, f.fdStatus, fl.authLevelName, c.comName FROM fundingauth fa INNER JOIN funding f ON fa.authFdCode = f.fdCode INNER JOIN company c ON f.fdComCode = c.comCode INNER JOIN fundingauthlevel fl ON fa.fdAuthLevelCode = fl.authLevelCode WHERE fa.authReceiver=#{receiverUserId} ORDER BY c.comName asc

SELECT i.investCode, i.investFdCode, i.investId, i.investTime, i.payCheck, f.fdCode, f.fdType, f.fdStatus, f.numberOfShares, f.fdTitle, f.issuePrice, CASE f.fdStatus WHEN '모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode GROUP BY si.investFdCode ) WHEN '결제모집중' THEN (SELECT SUM(si.purchaseShares) FROM investment si WHERE si.investFdCode = f.fdCode AND si.payCheck = 1 GROUP BY si.investFdCode) END investtotal FROM investment i INNER JOIN funding f ON i.investFdCode = f.fdCode WHERE i.investId = #{investId} GROUP BY i.investCode

mapper.update: UPDATE company SET comCode=#{comCode}, comName=#{comName}, comNumber=#{comNumber}, comHomePage=#{comHomePage}, comCeoName=#{comCeoName}, comEstablishYear=#{comEstablishYear}, comInfo=#{comInfo}, comLogoServerName=#{comLogoServerName}, comLogoHeight=#{comLogoHeight}, comLogoWidth=#{comLogoWidth}, comLogoSize=#{comLogoSize}, comLogoExtension=#{comLogoExtension}, comSummary=#{comSummary}, comActivitySummary=#{comActivitySummary}, comOpenUserId=#{comOpenUserId}, comAdminApproval=#{comAdminApproval}, comApprovalDate=#{comApprovalDate}, comApprovalId=#{comApprovalId}, comDelRequestId=#{comDelRequestId}, comDelTime=#{comDelTime}, comDelApprovalId=#{comDelApprovalId} WHERE comCode=#{comCode}

UPDATE company SET comCode=#{comCode}, comName=#{comName}, comNumber=#{comNumber}, comHomePage=#{comHomePage}, comCeoName=#{comCeoName}, comEstablishYear=#{comEstablishYear}, comInfo=#{comInfo}, comLogoServerName=#{comLogoServerName}, comLogoHeight=#{comLogoHeight}, comLogoWidth=#{comLogoWidth}, comLogoSize=#{comLogoSize}, comLogoExtension=#{comLogoExtension}, comSummary=#{comSummary}, comActivitySummary=#{comActivitySummary}, comOpenUserId=#{comOpenUserId}, comAdminApproval=#{comAdminApproval}, comApprovalDate=#{comApprovalDate}, comApprovalId=#{comApprovalId}, comDelRequestId=#{comDelRequestId}, comDelTime=now(), comDelApprovalId=#{comDelApprovalId} WHERE comCode=#{comCode}

SELECT emComName FROM employee WHERE emUserId=#{emUserId} AND emRankCode=2 And emCheck=1
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE emComName=#{emComName} and emCheck=0

SELECT comCode, comName, comNumber, comHomePage, comCeoName, comInfo, comOpenUserId, comAdminApproval, comApprovalDate, comApprovalId, comDelRequestId, comDelTime, comDelApprovalId FROM company ORDER BY comOpenUserId asc
mapper.update: UPDATE company SET comDelRequestId=null, comDelTime=null WHERE comCode=#{comCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (emUserId, emComCode, emComName, emRankCode, emDepartment, emCheck, emDelRequest) VALUES (#{emUserId}, #{emComCode}, #{emComName}, #{emRankCode}, #{emDepartment}, #{emCheck}, #{emDelRequest})
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET emCode=#{emCode}, emUserId=#{emUserId}, emComCode=#{emComCode}, emComName=#{emComName}, emRankCode=#{emRankCode}, emDepartment=#{emDepartment}, emCheck=#{emCheck}, emDelRequest=#{emDelRequest} WHERE emCode=#{emCode}
mapper.select: SELECT u.userId, u.nickname, u.name, u.levelCode, u.uDelTime, ac.accountCode, ac.accountId, ac.secCompany, ac.accountNumber, ac.accountNickname FROM user u left join account ac on u.userId = ac.accountId where u.userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE userdetail SET userDetailId=#{userDetailId}, phoneFront3=#{phoneFront3}, phoneRest8=#{phoneRest8}, postalCode=#{postalCode}, address=#{address}, address2=#{address2}, nameCheck=#{nameCheck} WHERE userDetailId=#{userDetailId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.userId, u.nickname, u.name, u.pw, u.levelCode, u.uDelTime, ud.phoneFront3, ud.phoneRest8, ud.postalCode, ud.address, ud.address2, ud.nameCheck, ul.userLevelName, rk.rankName, com.comName, com.comCode, com.comName, com.comNumber, com.comHomePage, com.comCeoName, com.comInfo, com.comOpenUserId, com.comAdminApproval, com.comApprovalDate, com.comApprovalId, com.comDelRequestId, com.comDelTime, com.comDelApprovalId FROM user u left join userdetail ud on u.userId=ud.userDetailId left join employee e on u.userId = e.emUserId left join company com on e.emComName = com.comName left join userlevel ul on u.levelCode = ul.userLevelCode left join rankcode rk on e.emRankCode = rk.rankCode
